src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: Dinten Senén, Sara Danius, sekretaris permanén Komite Nobel pikeun Sastra di Akademi Swedia, umum diumumkeun salila hiji program radio dina Sveriges Radio di Swedia nu panitia, teu tiasa ngahontal langsung Bob Dylan ngeunaan unggul 2016 Nobel Prize dina karya Sastra, geus ditinggalkeun usaha anak pikeun ngahontal manéhna.
hyp_text: Dinaon, Sara Danius, sekretaris permanen Komité Nobel Sastra di Akademi Swédia, ngumbarkeun ngaliwatan acara radio di Sveriges Radio di Swédia, yén komité ieu ngabaléhkeun pikeun ngajangkungkeun Bob Dylan langsung ngeunaan ngaran pikeun hadiah Nobel Sastra taun 2016, geus ngabaléhkeun upahna ngajangkungkeunana.

src_text: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
ref_text: Ieu bala téh ngabalukarkeun pamaréntah India kudu ngukur sumebarna di wilayah tukang bagong anu terdampak kalawan serius, ngirimkeun rébuan reungit sarta nyemprotkeun péstisida.

src_text: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."
ref_text: Anjeunna dilaporkeun usiana 20 taunan. Dina hiji pernyataan, Bieber nyatakeun "sanajan abdi teu aya didinya sareng teu terlibat dina kacilakaan tragis eta, abdi turut belasungkawa ka kaluwargi korban."
hyp_text: Dia dipikarengkeun dina umur 20-an. Dina kantor pernyataan, Bieber ngomong: 'Sedengkeun kuring teu aya di tempat kawasana atawa nginvolve langsung jeung kajadian tragis ieu, tapi pikiran jeung doa ku pikeun kulawarga korban.'

src_text: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
ref_text: Tilu Karajaan mangrupikeun salah sahiji éra anu paling numpahkeun getih dina sajarah Cina Kuno, rébuan jalma maot pikeun diuk di korsi paling luhur di istana ageung di Xi'an.
hyp_text: Kerajaan Tiga ieu dina jaman kuna Cina, dina abad-abad kaasup kauripan paling panjangna, ribuan jalma mati ngamung pikeun ngajajalkeun kursi pangluasna di istana gedé Xi'an.

hyp_text: Kuwi pyramida gedé diwangun pikeun ngarjajah Prabu Khufu, jeung sawatara kuwi pyramida, makam, jeung kuil-kuil lianna diwangun pikeun ngarjajah istri jeung kawargaa Prabu Khufu.

src_text: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.

hyp_text: Sawawa kawasana anu ngawongna ngaliukeun ngarankeun pangarujuan sosialisasi nyaéta ngalakonkeun kasus-kasus nu paling umum, nu ngalakonkeun anu ngawongna ngaliukeun anu ngawongna anu ditingali ku dewasa sarta ngalakonkeun anu ngawongna, ngawongna sarta ngawongna, nu ngawongna ngaliukeun anu ngawongna ngawongna sarta ngawongna.

src_text: In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.
ref_text: Dina kaayaan anu saé, anjeun bakal tiasa nutupan jarak anu langkung jauh tibatan leumpang - tapi jarang pisan anjeun sami sareng kecepatan ski antar negeri tanpa mawa ransel anu beurat dina jalur anu rata.
